definition: erhua variant of 挨個|挨个[ai1 ge4]
in order/in sequence/close to/adjacent to
to suffer/to endure/to pull through (hard times)/to delay/to stall/to play for time/to dawdle
variant of 個|个[ge4]
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
child/son
non-syllabic diminutive suffix/retroflex final

sentences.english: He looked from one to the other of them. "I think that you already know this."
sentences.chinese: 他挨个儿地看着他们，“我以为你们已经知道了。

sentences.english: We were all sat around the pool, waiting for our time to go to see the manager.
sentences.chinese: 我们围着游泳池坐了一圈，挨个儿等着和教练见面。

sentences.english: The pupils took turns in reading out their work.
sentences.chinese: 学生们挨个儿朗读他们的作业。

sentences.english: In the middle there stood twelve cradles next to each other.
sentences.chinese: 在洞的正中央有十二个摇蓝挨个儿排放着。

definition: one by one/in turn
from house to house, one by one
as a rule/as usual/usually
to go from house to house
not to mind taking all the trouble (idiom)/to take great pains/to be very patient
to carry
to push lightly/to flick to one side/to get rid of
(idiom) with everyone lending a hand (eagerly but somewhat chaotically)
(dialect) oneself/by oneself
glad and diligent
erhua variant of 可勁|可劲[ke3 jin4]
regardless of the consequences/recklessly relying on a hopelessly optimistic forecast
pinyin: bu4 guan3 san1 qi1 er4 shi2 yi1

definition: erhua variant of 一下[yi1 xia4]
to look for/to explore/to probe
repeatedly/back and forth again and again
to drive away
